name: Alone Together
description: You cannot see your teammates. You can't melee damage your teammates but you can still hit them with projectiles.

name: Armor Compensation
description: Team of 5's or higher can't wear any diamond armor. For every team size lower than 5, each team member can wear an extra piece of diamond armor.

name: Avengers
description: Each player will gain an extra ability or items based on the Avengers: Iron Man, Quicksilver, Thor, Spider Man, Captain America or Hulk.

name: Balance
description: After you mine your 5th diamond, there is a chance your diamond will not drop from diamond ore. This chance increases as you mine more diamonds.

name: Barebones
description: Nether is disabled. You cannot craft enchantment tables, anvils or golden apples. Iron is the highest tier. Mining any ore except coal and iron drops an iron ingot. Players drop 1 diamond, 1 golden apple, 32 arrows and 2 strings on death.

name: Best PvE
description: Players start on a "Best PvE" list and gain 1 extra heart every 10 minutes. Taking damage removes you from the list. Getting a kill adds you back.

name: Bigcrack
description: There is a wide crack through the x-axis of the map.

name: Blast Mining
description: When mining any ore, there is a 5% chance a creeper spawns (given slowness for 2s) and a 3% chance an ignited TNT spawns. These never happen simultaneously.

name: Bleeding Sweets
description: Players drop 1 diamond, 7 gold, 1 book, 2 string and 24 arrows on death.

name: Blood Diamonds
description: Each time you mine diamond ore, you lose half a heart.

name: Blood Diamonds+
description: Each time you mine a diamond you take damage, and you progressively lose more health the more you mine.

name: Bowfighters
description: Everyone is given 1 arrow, 2 string and an Infinity book. The highest tier of melee weapon you can get is wood sword/stone axe.

name: Bowless
description: You can't craft or use bows.

name: Bridge Eggs
description: When you shoot an egg, it spawns a trail of blocks for you to walk on (3s cooldown). Chickens have a 30% chance of dropping an egg.

name: Children Left Unattended
description: When your teammate dies, the remaining player receives Speed 2 (30s) and a tamed wolf.

name: Craftclean
description: Surround a piece of coal with 8 smeltable items in a crafting bench to get 8 of the smelted result.

name: Cripple
description: When you take fall damage you get Slowness 2 for 30 seconds.

name: Cupid
description: When you hit a player with a bow you gain 1% of your health back.

name: Custom 0/0
description: The meetup location at 0/0 is changed to the host's chosen coordinates.

name: CutClean
description: All ores and food drop their smelted variant.

name: Depths
description: As you go farther down the Y level, mobs will deal more damage.

name: Dependency
description: You cannot craft a crafting table. The only way to access one is to right click one of your teammates.

name: Dolphins
description: Whenever a player is in water, they will propel forwards and 'Dolphin dive' when sneaking.

name: DiamondLess
description: Diamonds do not drop from ore. Instead players drop 1 diamond on death.

name: Go To Hell
description: After 45 minutes, you must go to the nether. If not, you will take half a heart every 30 seconds.

name: Golden Heights
description: Sea level reduced to Y24 with floating islands. Gold, Lapis, Redstone spawn in the sky while diamonds spawn at their usual level.

name: Golden Retriever
description: When a player dies, instead of a player head dropping, a golden head is dropped.

name: Grave Robbers
description: When a player is killed, a gravestone spawns with their name on it. You must dig up the grave to get the player's loot.

name: HasteyBoys
description: All tools are equipped with Efficiency 3 and Unbreaking 1.

name: HasteyBabies
description: All tools are equipped with Efficiency 1.

name: Infestation
description: Every mob has a 40% chance of respawning when killed.

name: Infinite Allies
description: You can ally with whoever you want, however many you want, but only 1 player can win.

name: Investments
description: You can invest diamonds or gold on a player. If that player gets a kill, you get double back. When they die, they drop your invested amount. Use /invest.

name: Krenzinator
description: No horses, nether is off, eggs deal 0.5 hearts, crafting a diamond sword costs 1 heart, and you can craft 1 diamond from 9 redstone blocks.

name: Midas
description: You get gold based on how many times you hit a player before killing them.

name: Monsters Inc
description: Place a door on the map, walk through it, and if there are 2+ doors on the map, you'll be teleported to one of them.

name: Mystery Teams
description: Your team is unknown to you. You must find your teammates using wools dyed in your team color.

name: Naked And Afraid
description: You cannot see the armour other enemy players are wearing.

name: Nightmare Mode
description: All mobs are dramatically enhanced. Creepers stalk faster and spawn larvae. Skeletons fire poison arrows. Zombies survive in sunlight and reanimate as skeletons. Spiders are faster and spray webs on death. Endermen ignite players and can summon blazes. Witches approach silently at terrifying speed.

name: No Anvils
description: You cannot use anvils.

name: No Diamond Armor
description: Diamond armor is not craftable.

name: No Enchant Preview
description: You cannot see the preview when hovering over enchantments in the enchant inventory.

name: No Fall
description: You cannot take fall damage.

name: Paper
description: Everyone takes 4 times as much horizontal knockback.

name: Parafusion
description: Your coordinates are broadcast in chat when you mine gold/diamond, go to the nether, craft a brewing stand or golden apple, and when you die.

name: Permakill
description: When somebody dies in game, day changes to night, or night changes to day.

name: Potential 0/0
description: The meetup coordinates are unknown. 3 potential meetup coordinates can be viewed using /potcoords. The real one is revealed when meetup starts.

name: Progressive Speed
description: Everyone starts with Speed 1. Each kill increases your speed tier by 1.

name: Quad Anvils
description: At +/- 250 there is an anvil that can be used. Anvils cannot be broken by hand but can still get damaged. Crafting anvils is disabled.

name: Radar
description: Clicking a clock shows the name, distance and health of players within 120 blocks. Usable once per 5 seconds.

name: Red Arrows
description: When a player dies, a red arrow spawns above them.

name: Refill
description: Players drop extra gold on death. The amount increases the lower the killer's health is. In team games, it's based on the team's average health.

name: Rodless
description: You cannot use fishing rods to hit players. You can still use them to fish as usual.

name: Rush
description: Short game, under 45 minutes. Wooden tools automatically turn into stone tools.

name: SandBags
description: Arrows break blocks in a 2x2 radius except for sand and gravel.

name: Signals
description: A surface firework with a correlated color spawns when a player mines diamonds/gold, goes to the nether, or crafts an enchantment table or golden apples.

name: Skyhigh
description: At PvP, you take damage every 30 seconds if you are below Y:120.

name: Skyhigh Nether
description: At Meetup, you take damage every 30 seconds below Y:170. The nether roof is removed. You get skyhigh items and 10 obsidian on start.

name: Speedy Miners
description: Players below Y:32 receive Speed 1.

name: Split Spawn
description: All players are scattered solo, regardless of their team.

name: Sugar Rush
description: Right-clicking sugar gives you Speed 2 for 8 seconds.

name: Superheroes
description: Each player gains a random power: Speed 2 + Haste 1; Jump 4 + Haste 2 + Saturation 10; Resistance 2 + Fire Resistance; or Health Boost (20 hearts) with extra healing from gapples/heads. Jump Boost power negates fall damage.

name: Superflat Villages
description: Villages generate much more often, similar to superflat worlds.

name: Switcheroo
description: When you shoot someone, you trade places with them.

name: Team Inventory
description: Teams share an extra inventory via /ti that all teammates can access. If the last player dies, the Team Inventory loot drops.

name: Timber
description: Breaking a log of a tree will cause the whole tree to fall down.

name: Timebomb
description: After killing a player, their loot drops into a chest. 30 seconds later, the chest explodes.

name: Training Rabbits
description: Everyone gets Jump Boost 2 for the whole game. As you get kills, your jump level increases by 1 tier. Fall damage is disabled.

name: Underground Parallel
description: Below Y42 is a copy of the surface. Trees underground are made of ores, stone and sea lanterns. Mineshafts generate floating below Y42.

name: Unstable Mining
description: When mining under Y40 there are chances of methane explosions, floods and unstable cave ceilings.

name: WebCage
description: A giant cobweb sphere appears where a player dies.
